net.sf.hajdbc.distributed

Interface CommandDispatcher<C>

  • Type Parameters:
    C - the command context type
    All Superinterfaces:
    Lifecycle
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JGroupsCommandDispatcher

    public interface CommandDispatcher<C>
extends Lifecycle
    RPC dispatcher that uses the command pattern.
    Author:
    Paul Ferraro

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <R> Map<Member,R> executeAll(Command<R,C> command)
      Execute the specified command on the group coordinator.
      <R> R executeCoordinator(Command<R,C> command)
      Execute the specified command on the coordinator.
      Member getCoordinator()
      Returns the group coordinator.
      Member getLocal()
      Returns the local member.
      boolean isCoordinator()
      Indicates whether or not the local member is the group coordinator.

      • Methods inherited from interface net.sf.hajdbc.Lifecycle

        start, stop

    • Method Detail

      • executeAll

        <R> Map<Member,R> executeAll(Command<R,C> command)
        Execute the specified command on the group coordinator.
        Type Parameters:
        R - the return value type
        Parameters:
        command - the command to execute
        Returns:
        a map of command execution results per member.

      • executeCoordinator

        <R> R executeCoordinator(Command<R,C> command)
        Execute the specified command on the coordinator.
        Type Parameters:
        R - the return value type
        Parameters:
        command - the command to execute
        Returns:
        the result of the command execution

      • isCoordinator

        boolean isCoordinator()
        Indicates whether or not the local member is the group coordinator.
        Returns:
        true, if the local member is the group coordinator, false otherwise.
